question.title: Getting InstrumentedCache metrics (such as mean-get-time) in EhCache v3
question.body: I am using EhCache v3 and not able to get some metrics that could be published in EhCache v2 registry by wrapping caches via InstrumentedCache class (metrics such as mean-get-time and objects) because v3 does not support InsrumentedCache, it seems to work only for EhCache v2 classes (net.sf stuff).
